column5: I'm embarrassed to admit that I check other forums. Two that I have used are http://hotspotoutdoors.com/forums/http://fishingminnesota.com/forums/ Google is now warning me about deceptive practices on these sites and scaring my pants off. Anyone have recent experience with these sites?

I'm on both regularly and have had no problems. I use Firefox. But I recently had an issue with Google and an email account that I couldn't access for a couple of days because Google said it was compromised. Somehow it miraculously got fixed. I think Google had a snafu at their end.
